backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing inquiries and products, with CRUD-style methods and demo product seeding.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, layout, providers, and global UI elements like the toaster.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form component handling validation and inquiry submission via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCat: Section showing three category cards linking to filtered catalog views.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedPro: Featured products section displaying the first eight products with loading skeletons and a catalog link.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero banner with headline, description, CTAs, and a hero image promoting shopping and contact options.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, contact email, and a dynamic year plus a referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the site header with logo, navigation, search bar, cart badge, and mobile menu via a sheet component.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Defines the main store layout wrapping pages with a header, footer, and content outlet.
frontend/src/components/products/Catalog: Provides dropdown controls for selecting product category and sort order.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product with image, info, rating, price, and an add‑to‑cart button.
Shows a responsive grid of product cards with loading skeletons and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/data/demoProducts.ts: Exports a large array of demo product objects grouped mostly in the Electronics category.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching products and performing mutations like submitting inquiries, initializing demo data, and adding products via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes along with global typography and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart with item controls, removal actions, and an order summary, redirecting when the cart is empty.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows a product catalog with filtering, searching, and sorting using product data from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders a demo checkout flow with an order summary and totals, showing a notice that payments are not implemented.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form and business contact information including email, phone, address, and hours.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows homepage sections and seeds demo products if needed before displaying featured items.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information with add-to-cart functionality and handles loading and missing-product states.
frontend/src/services/demoSeeder.ts: Seeds demo products into the backend once per browser using localStorage and randomizes optional ratings before adding each product.
frontend/src/state/cart.tsx: Implements a React cart context with persistent localStorage state, item add/update/remove logic, and derived totals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for a styled storefront UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including requirements, features, image assets, and project state version for the e-commerce template.
